title: An Edge Extension that allows developers to create HTTP REST calls
body: As a SharePoint and web developer, I often have to create and troubleshoot HTTP REST calls.  I would like to manipulate the querystring, headers and body as well as use different HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.) and see the results.

comments.body: See also YARC for chrome, Advanced REST client, Postman,  etc.
A extension like RESTClient  would be nice!
Not exists a Rest Client for Microsoft Edge....
